law.catch_line: Course for paramedics on recognition and prevention of pediatric abusive head trauma.
law.text: The board shall require continuing education for paramedics that includes the completion of one and one-half (1.5) hours of board approved continuing education covering the recognition and prevention of pediatric abusive head trauma, as defined in KRS 620.020, at least one (1) time every five (5) years. The one and one-half (1.5) hours required under this section shall be included in the current number of required continuing education hours.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2010.
